43// TODO move to parsers
44SubPeriodsCoupon1::Type parseSubPeriodsCouponType(const string& s) {
45 if (s == "Compounding")
46 return SubPeriodsCoupon1::Compounding;
47 else if (s == "Averaging")
48 return SubPeriodsCoupon1::Averaging;
49 else
50 QL_FAIL("SubPeriodsCoupon type " << s << " not recognized");
51};
52
53void checkContinuationMappings(const map<Natural, Natural>& mp, const string& name) {
54
55 Natural previousValue = 0;
56 for (const auto& kv : mp) {
57 QL_REQUIRE(kv.first <= kv.second, "Not allowed a " << name << " continuation mapping where From (" <<
58 kv.first << ") is greater than To (" << kv.second << ").");
59 QL_REQUIRE(kv.second > previousValue, "The To " << name << " continuation mappings should be strictly " <<
60 "increasing but got " << kv.second << " <= " << previousValue);
61 previousValue = kv.second;
62 }
63}

70Convention::Convention(const string& id, Type type) : type_(type), id_(id) {}
71
72ZeroRateConvention::ZeroRateConvention(const string& id, const string& dayCounter, const string& compounding,
73 const string& compoundingFrequency)
74 : Convention(id, Type::Zero), tenorBased_(false), strDayCounter_(dayCounter), strCompounding_(compounding),
75 strCompoundingFrequency_(compoundingFrequency) {
76 build();
77}
78
79ZeroRateConvention::ZeroRateConvention(const string& id, const string& dayCounter, const string& tenorCalendar,
80 const string& compounding, const string& compoundingFrequency,
81 const string& spotLag, const string& spotCalendar, const string& rollConvention,
82 const string& eom)
83 : Convention(id, Type::Zero), tenorBased_(true), strDayCounter_(dayCounter), strTenorCalendar_(tenorCalendar),
84 strCompounding_(compounding), strCompoundingFrequency_(compoundingFrequency), strSpotLag_(spotLag),
85 strSpotCalendar_(spotCalendar), strRollConvention_(rollConvention), strEom_(eom) {
86 build();
87}
88
89void ZeroRateConvention::build() {
90 dayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strDayCounter_);
91 compounding_ = strCompounding_.empty() ? Continuous : parseCompounding(strCompounding_);
92 compoundingFrequency_ = strCompoundingFrequency_.empty() ? Annual : parseFrequency(strCompoundingFrequency_);
93 if (tenorBased_) {
94 tenorCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strTenorCalendar_);
95 spotLag_ = strSpotLag_.empty() ? 0 : lexical_cast<Natural>(strSpotLag_);
96 spotCalendar_ = strSpotCalendar_.empty() ? NullCalendar() : parseCalendar(strSpotCalendar_);
97 rollConvention_ = strRollConvention_.empty() ? Following : parseBusinessDayConvention(strRollConvention_);
98 eom_ = strEom_.empty() ? false : parseBool(strEom_);
99 }
100}
101
102void ZeroRateConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
103
104 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Zero");
105 type_ = Type::Zero;
106 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
107 tenorBased_ = XMLUtils::getChildValueAsBool(node, "TenorBased", true);
108
109 // Get string values from xml
110 strDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "DayCounter", true);
111 strCompoundingFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "CompoundingFrequency", false);
112 strCompounding_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Compounding", false);
113 if (tenorBased_) {
114 strTenorCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "TenorCalendar", true);
115 strSpotLag_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotLag", false);
116 strSpotCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotCalendar", false);
117 strRollConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "RollConvention", false);
118 strEom_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "EOM", false);
119 }
120 build();
121}

123XMLNode* ZeroRateConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
124
125 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("Zero");
126 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", id_);
127 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "TenorBased", tenorBased_);
128 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "DayCounter", strDayCounter_);
129 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "CompoundingFrequency", strCompoundingFrequency_);
130 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Compounding", strCompounding_);
131 if (tenorBased_) {
132 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "TenorCalendar", strTenorCalendar_);
133 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SpotLag", strSpotLag_);
134 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SpotCalendar", strSpotCalendar_);
135 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "RollConvention", strRollConvention_);
136 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "EOM", strEom_);
137 }
138
139 return node;
140}

152void DepositConvention::build() {
153 calendar_ = parseCalendar(strCalendar_);
154 convention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strConvention_);
155 eom_ = parseBool(strEom_);
156 dayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strDayCounter_);

160void DepositConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
161
162 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Deposit");

172 strConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Convention", true);
173 strEom_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "EOM", true);
174 strDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "DayCounter", true);
175 strSettlementDays_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SettlementDays", true);
176 build();
177 }
178}

191 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "DayCounter", strDayCounter_);
192 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SettlementDays", strSettlementDays_);

195 return node;

201FutureConvention::FutureConvention(const string& id, const string& index,
202 const QuantLib::RateAveraging::Type overnightIndexFutureNettingType,
203 const DateGenerationRule dateGenerationRule)
204 : Convention(id, Type::Future), strIndex_(index),
205 overnightIndexFutureNettingType_(overnightIndexFutureNettingType) {
206 parseIborIndex(strIndex_);
207}
208
209void FutureConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
210 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Future");
211 type_ = Type::Future;
212 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
213 strIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Index", true);
214 parseIborIndex(strIndex_);
215 string nettingTypeStr = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OvernightIndexFutureNettingType", false);
216 overnightIndexFutureNettingType_ =
217 nettingTypeStr.empty() ? RateAveraging::Type::Compound : parseOvernightIndexFutureNettingType(nettingTypeStr);
218 string dateGenerationStr = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "DateGenerationRule", false);
219 dateGenerationRule_ =
220 dateGenerationStr.empty() ? DateGenerationRule::IMM : parseFutureDateGenerationRule(dateGenerationStr);
221}
222
223XMLNode* FutureConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
224
225 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("Future");
226 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", id_);
227 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Index", strIndex_);
228 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OvernightIndexFutureNettingType", ore::data::to_string(overnightIndexFutureNettingType_));
229 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "DateGenerationRule", ore::data::to_string(dateGenerationRule_));
230 return node;
231}

259OisConvention::OisConvention(const string& id, const string& spotLag, const string& index,
260 const string& fixedDayCounter, const string& fixedCalendar, const string& paymentLag,
261 const string& eom, const string& fixedFrequency, const string& fixedConvention,
262 const string& fixedPaymentConvention, const string& rule, const string& paymentCal)
263 : Convention(id, Type::OIS), strSpotLag_(spotLag), strIndex_(index), strFixedDayCounter_(fixedDayCounter),
264 strFixedCalendar_(fixedCalendar), strPaymentLag_(paymentLag), strEom_(eom), strFixedFrequency_(fixedFrequency),
265 strFixedConvention_(fixedConvention), strFixedPaymentConvention_(fixedPaymentConvention), strRule_(rule),
266 strPaymentCal_(paymentCal) {
267 build();
268}
269
270void OisConvention::build() {
271 auto tmpIndex = parseIborIndex(strIndex_);
272 spotLag_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strSpotLag_);
273 fixedDayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strFixedDayCounter_);
274 fixedCalendar_ = strFixedCalendar_.empty() ? tmpIndex->fixingCalendar() : parseCalendar(strFixedCalendar_);
275 paymentLag_ = strPaymentLag_.empty() ? 0 : lexical_cast<Natural>(strPaymentLag_);
276 eom_ = strEom_.empty() ? false : parseBool(strEom_);
277 fixedFrequency_ = strFixedFrequency_.empty() ? Annual : parseFrequency(strFixedFrequency_);
278 fixedConvention_ = strFixedConvention_.empty() ? Following : parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixedConvention_);
279 fixedPaymentConvention_ =
280 strFixedPaymentConvention_.empty() ? Following : parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixedPaymentConvention_);
281 rule_ = strRule_.empty() ? DateGeneration::Backward : parseDateGenerationRule(strRule_);
282 paymentCal_ = strPaymentCal_.empty() ? Calendar() : parseCalendar(strPaymentCal_);
283}
284
285void OisConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
286
287 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "OIS");
288 type_ = Type::OIS;
289 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
290
291 // Get string values from xml
292 strSpotLag_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotLag", true);
293 strIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Index", true);
294 strFixedDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedDayCounter", true);
295 // bwd compatibility
296 strFixedCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedCalendar", false);
297 strPaymentLag_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PaymentLag", false);
298 strEom_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "EOM", false);
299 strFixedFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedFrequency", false);
300 strFixedConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedConvention", false);
301 strFixedPaymentConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedPaymentConvention", false);
302 strRule_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Rule", false);
303 strPaymentCal_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PaymentCalendar", false);
304
305 build();
306}

308XMLNode* OisConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
309
310 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("OIS");
311 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", id_);
312 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SpotLag", strSpotLag_);
313 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Index", strIndex_);
314 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixedDayCounter", strFixedDayCounter_);
315 if(!strFixedCalendar_.empty())
316 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixedCalendar", strFixedCalendar_);
317 if (!strPaymentLag_.empty())
318 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "PaymentLag", strPaymentLag_);
319 if (!strEom_.empty())
320 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "EOM", strEom_);
321 if (!strFixedFrequency_.empty())
322 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixedFrequency", strFixedFrequency_);
323 if (!strFixedConvention_.empty())
324 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixedConvention", strFixedConvention_);
325 if (!strFixedPaymentConvention_.empty())
326 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixedPaymentConvention", strFixedPaymentConvention_);
327 if (!strRule_.empty())
328 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Rule", strRule_);
329 if (!strPaymentCal_.empty())
330 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "PaymentCalendar", strPaymentCal_);
331
332 return node;
333}

335boost::shared_ptr<OvernightIndex> OisConvention::index() const {
336 auto tmp = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<OvernightIndex>(parseIborIndex(strIndex_));
337 QL_REQUIRE(tmp, "The index string '" << strIndex_ << "' does not represent an overnight index.");
338 return tmp;
339}

349void IborIndexConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
350 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "IborIndex");
351 type_ = Type::IborIndex;
352 localId_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
353 strFixingCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixingCalendar", true);
354 strDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "DayCounter", true);
355 settlementDays_ = XMLUtils::getChildValueAsInt(node, "SettlementDays", true);
356 strBusinessDayConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "BusinessDayConvention", true);
357 endOfMonth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValueAsBool(node, "EndOfMonth", true);
358 build();
359}

361XMLNode* IborIndexConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
362 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("IborIndex");
363 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", localId_);
364 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixingCalendar", strFixingCalendar_);
365 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "DayCounter", strDayCounter_);
366 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SettlementDays", static_cast<int>(settlementDays_));
367 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "BusinessDayConvention", strBusinessDayConvention_);
368 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "EndOfMonth", endOfMonth_);
369 return node;
370}
371
372void IborIndexConvention::build() {
373 // just a check really that the id is consistent with the ibor index name rules
374 vector<string> tokens;
375 split(tokens, localId_, boost::is_any_of("-"));
376 QL_REQUIRE(tokens.size() == 2 || tokens.size() == 3,
377 "Two or three tokens required in IborIndexConvention " << localId_ << ": CCY-INDEX or CCY-INDEX-TERM");
378
379 // set the Id - this converts the local id term from "7D" to "1W", "28D" to "1M" etc, so if can be picked
380 // up by searches
381 id_ = (tokens.size() == 3) ? (tokens[0] + "-" + tokens[1] + "-" + to_string(parsePeriod(tokens[2]))) : localId_;
382}

410void OvernightIndexConvention::build() {
411 // just a check really that the id is consistent with the ibor index name rules
412 vector<string> tokens;
413 split(tokens, id_, boost::is_any_of("-"));
414 QL_REQUIRE(tokens.size() == 2, "Two tokens required in OvernightIndexConvention " << id_ << ": CCY-INDEX");
415}

441IRSwapConvention::IRSwapConvention(const string& id, const string& fixedCalendar, const string& fixedFrequency,
442 const string& fixedConvention, const string& fixedDayCounter, const string& index,
443 bool hasSubPeriod, const string& floatFrequency, const string& subPeriodsCouponType)
444 : Convention(id, Type::Swap), hasSubPeriod_(hasSubPeriod), strFixedCalendar_(fixedCalendar),
445 strFixedFrequency_(fixedFrequency), strFixedConvention_(fixedConvention), strFixedDayCounter_(fixedDayCounter),
446 strIndex_(index), strFloatFrequency_(floatFrequency), strSubPeriodsCouponType_(subPeriodsCouponType) {
447 build();
448}
449
450void IRSwapConvention::build() {
451 fixedCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strFixedCalendar_);
452 fixedFrequency_ = parseFrequency(strFixedFrequency_);
453 fixedConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixedConvention_);
454 fixedDayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strFixedDayCounter_);
455 parseIborIndex(strIndex_);
456 if (hasSubPeriod_) {
457 floatFrequency_ = parseFrequency(strFloatFrequency_);
458 subPeriodsCouponType_ = parseSubPeriodsCouponType(strSubPeriodsCouponType_);
459 } else {
460 floatFrequency_ = NoFrequency;
461 subPeriodsCouponType_ = SubPeriodsCoupon1::Compounding;
462 }
463}

465void IRSwapConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
466
467 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Swap");
468 type_ = Type::Swap;
469 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
470
471 // Get string values from xml
472 strFixedCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedCalendar", true);
473 strFixedFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedFrequency", true);
474 strFixedConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedConvention", true);
475 strFixedDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedDayCounter", true);
476 strIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Index", true);
477
478 // optional
479 strFloatFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FloatFrequency", false);
480 strSubPeriodsCouponType_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SubPeriodsCouponType", false);
481 hasSubPeriod_ = (strFloatFrequency_ != "");
482
483 build();
484}

517void AverageOisConvention::build() {
518 parseIborIndex(strIndex_);
519 spotLag_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strSpotLag_);
520 fixedTenor_ = parsePeriod(strFixedTenor_);
521 fixedDayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strFixedDayCounter_);
522 fixedCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strFixedCalendar_);
523 fixedConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixedConvention_);
524 fixedPaymentConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixedPaymentConvention_);
525 fixedFrequency_ = strFixedFrequency_.empty() ? Annual : parseFrequency(strFixedFrequency_);
526 onTenor_ = parsePeriod(strOnTenor_);
527 rateCutoff_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strRateCutoff_);
528}

530void AverageOisConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
531
532 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "AverageOIS");
533 type_ = Type::AverageOIS;
534 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
535
536 // Get string values from xml
537 strSpotLag_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotLag", true);
538 strFixedTenor_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedTenor", true);
539 strFixedDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedDayCounter", true);
540 strFixedCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedCalendar", true);
541 strFixedConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedConvention", true);
542 strFixedPaymentConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedPaymentConvention", true);
543 strFixedFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixedFrequency", false);
544 strIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Index", true);
545 strOnTenor_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OnTenor", true);

740FXConvention::FXConvention(const string& id, const string& spotDays, const string& sourceCurrency,
741 const string& targetCurrency, const string& pointsFactor, const string& advanceCalendar,
742 const string& spotRelative, const string& endOfMonth, const string& convention)
743 : Convention(id, Type::FX), strSpotDays_(spotDays), strSourceCurrency_(sourceCurrency),
744 strTargetCurrency_(targetCurrency), strPointsFactor_(pointsFactor), strAdvanceCalendar_(advanceCalendar),
745 strSpotRelative_(spotRelative), strEndOfMonth_(endOfMonth), strConvention_(convention) {
746 build();
747}
748
749void FXConvention::build() {
750 spotDays_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strSpotDays_);
751 sourceCurrency_ = parseCurrency(strSourceCurrency_);
752 targetCurrency_ = parseCurrency(strTargetCurrency_);
753 pointsFactor_ = parseReal(strPointsFactor_);
754 advanceCalendar_ = strAdvanceCalendar_.empty() ? NullCalendar() : parseCalendar(strAdvanceCalendar_);
755 spotRelative_ = strSpotRelative_.empty() ? true : parseBool(strSpotRelative_);
756 endOfMonth_ = strEndOfMonth_.empty() ? false : parseBool(strEndOfMonth_);
757 convention_ = strConvention_.empty() ? Following : parseBusinessDayConvention(strConvention_);
758}

768 strSourceCurrency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SourceCurrency", true);
769 strTargetCurrency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "TargetCurrency", true);
770 strPointsFactor_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PointsFactor", true);
771 strAdvanceCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "AdvanceCalendar", false);
772 strSpotRelative_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotRelative", false);
773 strEndOfMonth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "EOM", false);

777}

800CrossCcyBasisSwapConvention::CrossCcyBasisSwapConvention(
801 const string& id, const string& strSettlementDays, const string& strSettlementCalendar,
802 const string& strRollConvention, const string& flatIndex, const string& spreadIndex, const string& strEom,
803 const string& strIsResettable, const string& strFlatIndexIsResettable, const string& strFlatTenor,
804 const string& strSpreadTenor, const string& strPaymentLag, const string& strFlatPaymentLag,
805 const string& strIncludeSpread, const string& strLookback, const string& strFixingDays, const string& strRateCutoff,
806 const string& strIsAveraged, const string& strFlatIncludeSpread, const string& strFlatLookback,
807 const string& strFlatFixingDays, const string& strFlatRateCutoff, const string& strFlatIsAveraged,
808 const Conventions* conventions)
809 : Convention(id, Type::CrossCcyBasis), strSettlementDays_(strSettlementDays),
810 strSettlementCalendar_(strSettlementCalendar), strRollConvention_(strRollConvention), strFlatIndex_(flatIndex),
811 strSpreadIndex_(spreadIndex), strEom_(strEom), strIsResettable_(strIsResettable),
812 strFlatIndexIsResettable_(strFlatIndexIsResettable), strFlatTenor_(strFlatTenor), strSpreadTenor_(strSpreadTenor),
813 strPaymentLag_(strPaymentLag), strFlatPaymentLag_(strFlatPaymentLag), strIncludeSpread_(strIncludeSpread),
814 strLookback_(strLookback), strFixingDays_(strFixingDays), strRateCutoff_(strRateCutoff),
815 strIsAveraged_(strIsAveraged), strFlatIncludeSpread_(strFlatIncludeSpread), strFlatLookback_(strFlatLookback),
816 strFlatFixingDays_(strFlatFixingDays), strFlatRateCutoff_(strFlatRateCutoff),
817 strFlatIsAveraged_(strFlatIsAveraged) {
818 build();
819}
820
821void CrossCcyBasisSwapConvention::build() {
822 settlementDays_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strSettlementDays_);
823 settlementCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strSettlementCalendar_);
824 rollConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strRollConvention_);
825 parseIborIndex(strFlatIndex_);
826 parseIborIndex(strSpreadIndex_);
827 eom_ = strEom_.empty() ? false : parseBool(strEom_);
828 isResettable_ = strIsResettable_.empty() ? false : parseBool(strIsResettable_);
829 flatIndexIsResettable_ = strFlatIndexIsResettable_.empty() ? true : parseBool(strFlatIndexIsResettable_);
830
831 // default to index tenor, except for ON indices, where we default to 3M since the index tenor 1D does not make sense for them
832
833 if (strFlatTenor_.empty()) {
834 auto tmp = flatIndex();
835 if (boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<OvernightIndex>(tmp))
836 flatTenor_ = 3 * Months;
837 else
838 flatTenor_ = tmp->tenor();
839 } else {
840 flatTenor_ = parsePeriod(strFlatTenor_);
841 }
842
843 if (strSpreadTenor_.empty()) {
844 auto tmp = spreadIndex();
845 if (boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<OvernightIndex>(tmp))
846 spreadTenor_ = 3 * Months;
847 else
848 spreadTenor_ = tmp->tenor();
849 } else {
850 spreadTenor_ = parsePeriod(strSpreadTenor_);
851 }
852
853 paymentLag_ = flatPaymentLag_ = 0;
854 if (!strPaymentLag_.empty())
855 paymentLag_ = parseInteger(strPaymentLag_);
856 if (!strFlatPaymentLag_.empty())
857 flatPaymentLag_ = parseInteger(strFlatPaymentLag_);
858
859 // only OIS
860 if (!strIncludeSpread_.empty())
861 includeSpread_ = parseBool(strIncludeSpread_);
862 if (!strLookback_.empty())
863 lookback_ = parsePeriod(strLookback_);
864 if (!strFixingDays_.empty())
865 fixingDays_ = parseInteger(strFixingDays_);
866 if (!strRateCutoff_.empty())
867 rateCutoff_ = parseInteger(strRateCutoff_);
868 if (!strIsAveraged_.empty())
869 isAveraged_ = parseBool(strIsAveraged_);
870 if (!strFlatIncludeSpread_.empty())
871 flatIncludeSpread_ = parseBool(strFlatIncludeSpread_);
872 if (!strFlatLookback_.empty())
873 flatLookback_ = parsePeriod(strFlatLookback_);
874 if (!strFlatFixingDays_.empty())
875 flatFixingDays_ = parseInteger(strFlatFixingDays_);
876 if (!strFlatRateCutoff_.empty())
877 flatRateCutoff_ = parseInteger(strFlatRateCutoff_);
878 if (!strFlatIsAveraged_.empty())
879 flatIsAveraged_ = parseBool(strFlatIsAveraged_);
880}

1128InflationSwapConvention::InflationSwapConvention()
1129 : fixConvention_(Following), interpolated_(false), adjustInfObsDates_(false),
1130 infConvention_(Following), publicationRoll_(PublicationRoll::None) {}
1131
1132InflationSwapConvention::InflationSwapConvention(const string& id, const string& strFixCalendar,
1133 const string& strFixConvention, const string& strDayCounter,
1134 const string& strIndex, const string& strInterpolated,
1135 const string& strObservationLag, const string& strAdjustInfObsDates,
1136 const string& strInfCalendar, const string& strInfConvention,
1137 PublicationRoll publicationRoll,
1138 const boost::shared_ptr<ScheduleData>& publicationScheduleData)
1139 : Convention(id, Type::InflationSwap), strFixCalendar_(strFixCalendar), strFixConvention_(strFixConvention),
1140 strDayCounter_(strDayCounter), strIndex_(strIndex), strInterpolated_(strInterpolated),
1141 strObservationLag_(strObservationLag), strAdjustInfObsDates_(strAdjustInfObsDates),
1142 strInfCalendar_(strInfCalendar), strInfConvention_(strInfConvention),
1143 publicationRoll_(publicationRoll), publicationScheduleData_(publicationScheduleData) {
1144 build();
1145}
1146
1147void InflationSwapConvention::build() {
1148 interpolated_ = parseBool(strInterpolated_);
1149 parseZeroInflationIndex(strIndex_, Handle<ZeroInflationTermStructure>());
1150 fixCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strFixCalendar_);
1151 fixConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strFixConvention_);
1152 dayCounter_ = parseDayCounter(strDayCounter_);
1153 index_ = parseZeroInflationIndex(strIndex_, Handle<ZeroInflationTermStructure>());
1154 observationLag_ = parsePeriod(strObservationLag_);
1155 adjustInfObsDates_ = parseBool(strAdjustInfObsDates_);
1156 infCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strInfCalendar_);
1157 infConvention_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(strInfConvention_);
1158 if (publicationRoll_ != PublicationRoll::None) {
1159 QL_REQUIRE(publicationScheduleData_, "Publication roll is " << publicationRoll_ << " for " << id() <<
1160 " so expect non-null publication schedule data.");
1161 publicationSchedule_ = makeSchedule(*publicationScheduleData_);
1162 }
1163}
1164
1165void InflationSwapConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
1166
1167 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "InflationSwap");
1168 type_ = Type::InflationSwap;
1169 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
1170
1171 // Get string values from xml
1172 strFixCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixCalendar", true);
1173 strFixConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "FixConvention", true);
1174 strDayCounter_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "DayCounter", true);
1175 strIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Index", true);
1176 strInterpolated_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Interpolated", true);
1177 strObservationLag_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "ObservationLag", true);
1178 strAdjustInfObsDates_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "AdjustInflationObservationDates", true);
1179 strInfCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "InflationCalendar", true);
1180 strInfConvention_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "InflationConvention", true);
1181
1182 publicationRoll_ = PublicationRoll::None;
1183 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "PublicationRoll")) {
1184 publicationRoll_ = parseInflationSwapPublicationRoll(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1185 }
1186
1187 if (publicationRoll_ != PublicationRoll::None) {
1188 XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "PublicationSchedule");
1189 QL_REQUIRE(n, "PublicationRoll is " << publicationRoll_ << " for " << id() <<
1190 " so expect non-empty PublicationSchedule.");
1191 publicationScheduleData_ = boost::make_shared<ScheduleData>();
1192 publicationScheduleData_->fromXML(n);
1193 }
1194
1195 build();
1196}
1197
1198XMLNode* InflationSwapConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
1199
1200 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("InflationSwap");
1201 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", id_);
1202 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixCalendar", strFixCalendar_);
1203 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "FixConvention", strFixConvention_);
1204 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "DayCounter", strDayCounter_);
1205 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Index", strIndex_);
1206 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Interpolated", strInterpolated_);
1207 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "ObservationLag", strObservationLag_);
1208 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "AdjustInflationObservationDates", strAdjustInfObsDates_);
1209 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "InflationCalendar", strInfCalendar_);
1210 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "InflationConvention", strInfConvention_);
1211
1212 if (publicationRoll_ != PublicationRoll::None) {
1213 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "RollOnPublication", to_string(publicationRoll_));
1214 QL_REQUIRE(publicationScheduleData_, "PublicationRoll is " << publicationRoll_ << " for "
1215 << id() << " so expect PublicationSchedule.");
1216
1217 // Need to change the name from ScheduleData to PublicationSchedule.
1218 XMLNode* n = publicationScheduleData_->toXML(doc);
1219 XMLUtils::setNodeName(doc, n, "PublicationSchedule");
1220 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, n);
1221 }
1222
1223 return node;
1224}

1256 rollConvention_ = strRollConvention_.empty() ? Following : parseBusinessDayConvention(strRollConvention_);

1258 }

1359CommodityForwardConvention::CommodityForwardConvention(const string& id, const string& spotDays,
1360 const string& pointsFactor, const string& advanceCalendar,
1361 const string& spotRelative, BusinessDayConvention bdc,
1362 bool outright)
1363 : Convention(id, Type::CommodityForward), bdc_(bdc), outright_(outright), strSpotDays_(spotDays),
1364 strPointsFactor_(pointsFactor), strAdvanceCalendar_(advanceCalendar), strSpotRelative_(spotRelative) {
1365 build();
1366}
1367
1368void CommodityForwardConvention::build() {
1369 spotDays_ = strSpotDays_.empty() ? 2 : lexical_cast<Natural>(strSpotDays_);
1370 pointsFactor_ = strPointsFactor_.empty() ? 1.0 : parseReal(strPointsFactor_);
1371 advanceCalendar_ = strAdvanceCalendar_.empty() ? NullCalendar() : parseCalendar(strAdvanceCalendar_);
1372 spotRelative_ = strSpotRelative_.empty() ? true : parseBool(strSpotRelative_);
1373}
1374
1375void CommodityForwardConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
1376
1377 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "CommodityForward");
1378 type_ = Type::CommodityForward;
1379 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
1380
1381 strSpotDays_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotDays", false);
1382 strPointsFactor_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PointsFactor", false);
1383 strAdvanceCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "AdvanceCalendar", false);
1384 strSpotRelative_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SpotRelative", false);
1385
1386 bdc_ = Following;
1387 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "BusinessDayConvention")) {
1388 bdc_ = parseBusinessDayConvention(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1389 }
1390
1391 outright_ = true;
1392 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "Outright")) {
1393 outright_ = parseBool(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1394 }
1395
1396 build();
1397}

1400

1405 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SpotDays", strSpotDays_);
1406 if (!strPointsFactor_.empty())
1407 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "PointsFactor", strPointsFactor_);
1408 if (!strAdvanceCalendar_.empty())
1409 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "AdvanceCalendar", strAdvanceCalendar_);

1411 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SpotRelative", strSpotRelative_);
1412

1529 const string& offPeakHours,
1530 const string& peakCalendar)
1531 : offPeakIndex_(offPeakIndex),
1532 peakIndex_(peakIndex),
1533 strOffPeakHours_(offPeakHours),
1534 strPeakCalendar_(peakCalendar) {
1535 build();
1536}
1537
1538void CommodityFutureConvention::OffPeakPowerIndexData::build() {
1539 offPeakHours_ = parseReal(strOffPeakHours_);
1540 peakCalendar_ = parseCalendar(strPeakCalendar_);
1541}
1542
1543void CommodityFutureConvention::OffPeakPowerIndexData::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
1544
1545 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "OffPeakPowerIndexData");
1546 offPeakIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OffPeakIndex", true);
1547 peakIndex_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PeakIndex", true);
1548 strOffPeakHours_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OffPeakHours", true);
1549 strPeakCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "PeakCalendar", true);
1550
1551 build();
1552}
1553
1554XMLNode* CommodityFutureConvention::OffPeakPowerIndexData::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
1555
1556 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("OffPeakPowerIndexData");
1557 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OffPeakIndex", offPeakIndex_);
1558 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "PeakIndex", peakIndex_);
1559 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OffPeakHours", strOffPeakHours_);
1560 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "PeakCalendar", strPeakCalendar_);
1561
1562 return node;
1563}
1564
1565CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry::ProhibitedExpiry()
1566 : forFuture_(true), futureBdc_(Preceding), forOption_(true), optionBdc_(Preceding) {}
1567
1568CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry::ProhibitedExpiry(const Date& expiry,
1569 bool forFuture,
1570 BusinessDayConvention futureBdc,
1571 bool forOption,
1572 BusinessDayConvention optionBdc)
1573 : expiry_(expiry), forFuture_(true), futureBdc_(Preceding),
1574 forOption_(true), optionBdc_(Preceding) {}
1575
1576void CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
1577 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Date");
1578 expiry_ = parseDate(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(node));
1579 string tmp = XMLUtils::getAttribute(node, "forFuture");
1580 forFuture_ = tmp.empty() ? true : parseBool(tmp);
1581 tmp = XMLUtils::getAttribute(node, "convention");
1582 futureBdc_ = tmp.empty() ? Preceding : parseBusinessDayConvention(tmp);
1583 tmp = XMLUtils::getAttribute(node, "forOption");
1584 forOption_ = tmp.empty() ? true : parseBool(tmp);
1585 tmp = XMLUtils::getAttribute(node, "optionConvention");
1586 optionBdc_ = tmp.empty() ? Preceding : parseBusinessDayConvention(tmp);
1587}
1588
1589XMLNode* CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
1590
1591 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("Date", to_string(expiry_));
1592 XMLUtils::addAttribute(doc, node, "forFuture", to_string(forFuture_));
1593 XMLUtils::addAttribute(doc, node, "convention", to_string(futureBdc_));
1594 XMLUtils::addAttribute(doc, node, "forOption", to_string(forOption_));
1595 XMLUtils::addAttribute(doc, node, "optionConvention", to_string(optionBdc_));
1596
1597 return node;
1598}

1600bool operator<(const CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry& lhs,
1601 const CommodityFutureConvention::ProhibitedExpiry& rhs) {
1602 return lhs.expiry() < rhs.expiry();
1603}

1749
1750
1751void CommodityFutureConvention::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
1752
1753 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "CommodityFuture");
1754 type_ = Type::CommodityFuture;
1755 id_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Id", true);
1756
1757 // Parse contract frequency first. If it is Daily, we do not need the AnchorDay node.
1758 strContractFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "ContractFrequency", true);
1759 strOptionContractFrequency_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OptionContractFrequency", false);
1760 if (strOptionContractFrequency_.empty())
1761 strOptionContractFrequency_ = strContractFrequency_;
1762
1763 contractFrequency_ = parseAndValidateFrequency(strContractFrequency_);
1764 optionContractFrequency_ = parseAndValidateFrequency(strOptionContractFrequency_);
1765
1766 // Variables related to the anchor day in a given month. Not needed if daily.
1767 if (contractFrequency_ == Weekly) {
1768 XMLNode* anchorNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "AnchorDay");
1769 if (XMLNode* tmp = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "WeeklyDayOfTheWeek")) {
1770 anchorType_ = AnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek;
1771 strWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(tmp);
1772 } else {
1773 QL_FAIL("Failed to parse AnchorDay node, the WeeklyDayOfTheWeek node is required for weekly contract expiries.");
1774 }
1775 } else if (contractFrequency_ != Daily || optionContractFrequency_ != Daily) {
1776 XMLNode* anchorNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "AnchorDay");
1777 QL_REQUIRE(anchorNode, "Expected an AnchorDay node in the FutureExpiry convention");
1778 if (XMLNode* nthNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "NthWeekday")) {
1779 anchorType_ = AnchorType::NthWeekday;
1780 strNth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(nthNode, "Nth", true);
1781 strWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(nthNode, "Weekday", true);
1782 } else if (XMLNode* tmp = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "DayOfMonth")) {
1783 anchorType_ = AnchorType::DayOfMonth;
1784 strDayOfMonth_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(tmp);
1785 } else if (XMLNode* tmp = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "CalendarDaysBefore")) {
1786 anchorType_ = AnchorType::CalendarDaysBefore;
1787 strCalendarDaysBefore_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(tmp);
1788 } else if (XMLNode* tmp = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "LastWeekday")) {
1789 anchorType_ = AnchorType::LastWeekday;
1790 strWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(tmp);
1791 } else if (XMLNode* tmp = XMLUtils::getChildNode(anchorNode, "BusinessDaysAfter")) {
1792 anchorType_ = AnchorType::BusinessDaysAfter;
1793 strBusinessDaysAfter_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(tmp);
1794 } else {
1795 QL_FAIL("Failed to parse AnchorDay node");
1796 }
1797 }
1798
1799 strCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "Calendar", true);
1800 strExpiryCalendar_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "ExpiryCalendar", false);
1801
1802 expiryMonthLag_ = 0;
1803 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "ExpiryMonthLag")) {
1804 expiryMonthLag_ = parseInteger(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1805 }
1806
1807 strOneContractMonth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OneContractMonth", false);
1808 strOffsetDays_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OffsetDays", false);
1809 strBdc_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "BusinessDayConvention", false);
1810
1811 adjustBeforeOffset_ = true;
1812 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "AdjustBeforeOffset")) {
1813 adjustBeforeOffset_ = parseBool(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1814 }
1815
1816 isAveraging_ = false;
1817 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "IsAveraging")) {
1818 isAveraging_ = parseBool(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1819 }
1820
1821 optionExpiryMonthLag_ = 0;
1822 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionExpiryMonthLag")) {
1823 optionExpiryMonthLag_ = parseInteger(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1824 }
1825
1826 bool foundOptionExpiryRule = false;
1827 std::string previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "";
1828
1829 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionExpiryOffset")) {
1830 QL_REQUIRE(optionContractFrequency_ != Weekly, "OptionExpiryOffset is not allowed for weekly option expiries");
1831 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::BusinessDaysBefore;
1832 strOptionExpiryOffset_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n);
1833 foundOptionExpiryRule = true;
1834 previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "OptionExpiryOffset";
1835 }
1836
1837 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionExpiryDay")) {
1838 QL_REQUIRE(!foundOptionExpiryRule, "Expect exactly one option expiry anchor date rule, found "
1839 << previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule << " and OptionExpiryDay");
1840 QL_REQUIRE(optionContractFrequency_ != Weekly, "OptionExpiryDay is not allowed for weekly option expiries");
1841 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::DayOfMonth;
1842 strOptionExpiryDay_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n);
1843 foundOptionExpiryRule = true;
1844 previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "OptionExpiryDay";
1845 }
1846
1847 if (XMLNode* optionNthNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionNthWeekday")) {
1848 QL_REQUIRE(!foundOptionExpiryRule, "Expect exactly one option expiry anchor date rule, found "
1849 << previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule << " and OptionNthWeekday");
1850 QL_REQUIRE(optionContractFrequency_ != Weekly,
1851 "OptionNthWeekday is not allowed for weekly option expiries");
1852 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::NthWeekday;
1853 strOptionNth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(optionNthNode, "Nth", true);
1854 strOptionWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(optionNthNode, "Weekday", true);
1855 foundOptionExpiryRule = true;
1856 previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "OptionNthWeekday";
1857 }
1858
1859 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionExpiryLastWeekdayOfMonth")) {
1860 QL_REQUIRE(!foundOptionExpiryRule, "Expect exactly one option expiry anchor date rule, found "
1861 << previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule << " and OptionExpiryLastWeekdayOfMonth");
1862 QL_REQUIRE(optionContractFrequency_ != Weekly,
1863 "OptionExpiryLastWeekdayOfMonth is not allowed for weekly option expiries");
1864 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::LastWeekday;
1865 strOptionWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n);
1866 foundOptionExpiryRule = true;
1867 previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "OptionExpiryLastWeekdayOfMonth";
1868 }
1869
1870 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OptionExpiryWeeklyDayOfTheWeek")) {
1871 QL_REQUIRE(!foundOptionExpiryRule, "Expect exactly one option expiry anchor date rule, found "
1872 << previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule
1873 << " and OptionExpiryWeeklyDayOfTheWeek");
1874 QL_REQUIRE(optionContractFrequency_ == Weekly,
1875 "OptionExpiryWeeklyDayOfTheWeek only allowed for weekly option expiries");
1876 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek;
1877 strOptionWeekday_ = XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n);
1878 foundOptionExpiryRule = true;
1879 previouslyFoundOptionExpiryRule = "OptionExpiryWeeklyDayOfTheWeek";
1880 }
1881
1882
1883 if (!foundOptionExpiryRule && optionContractFrequency_ == Weekly) {
1884 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek;
1885 strOptionWeekday_ = strWeekday_;
1886 } else if (!foundOptionExpiryRule) {
1887 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::BusinessDaysBefore;
1888 strOptionExpiryOffset_ = "";
1889 }
1890
1891
1892
1893 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "ProhibitedExpiries")) {
1894 auto datesNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(n, "Dates");
1895 QL_REQUIRE(datesNode, "ProhibitedExpiries node must have a Dates node.");
1896 auto dateNodes = XMLUtils::getChildrenNodes(datesNode, "Date");
1897 for (const auto& dateNode : dateNodes) {
1898 ProhibitedExpiry pe;
1899 pe.fromXML(dateNode);
1900 if (validateBdc(pe)) {
1901 // First date is inserted, subsequent duplicates are ignored.
1902 prohibitedExpiries_.insert(pe);
1903 }
1904 }
1905 }
1906
1907 if (contractFrequency_ == Monthly) {
1908 auto validContractMonthNode = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "ValidContractMonths");
1909 if (validContractMonthNode) {
1910 auto monthNodes = XMLUtils::getChildrenNodes(validContractMonthNode, "Month");
1911 for (const auto& month : monthNodes) {
1912 validContractMonths_.insert(parseMonth(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(month)));
1913 }
1914 }
1915 }
1916
1917 strOptionBdc_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "OptionBusinessDayConvention", false);
1918
1919 futureContinuationMappings_.clear();
1920 auto tmp = XMLUtils::getChildrenValues(node, "FutureContinuationMappings",
1921 "ContinuationMapping", "From", "To", false);
1922 for (const auto& kv : tmp) {
1923 futureContinuationMappings_[parseInteger(kv.first)] = parseInteger(kv.second);
1924 }
1925
1926 optionContinuationMappings_.clear();
1927 tmp = XMLUtils::getChildrenValues(node, "OptionContinuationMappings",
1928 "ContinuationMapping", "From", "To", false);
1929 for (const auto& kv : tmp) {
1930 optionContinuationMappings_[parseInteger(kv.first)] = parseInteger(kv.second);
1931 }
1932
1933 if (isAveraging_) {
1934 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "AveragingData")) {
1935 averagingData_.fromXML(n);
1936 }
1937 }
1938
1939 hoursPerDay_ = Null<Natural>();
1940 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "HoursPerDay")) {
1941 hoursPerDay_ = parseInteger(XMLUtils::getNodeValue(n));
1942 }
1943
1944 if (XMLNode* n = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node, "OffPeakPowerIndexData")) {
1945 offPeakPowerIndexData_ = OffPeakPowerIndexData();
1946 offPeakPowerIndexData_->fromXML(n);
1947 }
1948
1949 indexName_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "IndexName", false);
1950
1951 savingsTime_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "SavingsTime", false, "US");
1952
1953 balanceOfTheMonth_ = XMLUtils::getChildValueAsBool(node, "BalanceOfTheMonth", false, false);
1954
1955 balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendarStr_ = XMLUtils::getChildValue(node, "BalanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar", false, "");
1956
1957 build();
1958}
1959
1960XMLNode* CommodityFutureConvention::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
1961
1962 XMLNode* node = doc.allocNode("CommodityFuture");
1963 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Id", id_);
1964
1965 if (contractFrequency_ != Daily || optionContractFrequency_ != Daily) {
1966 XMLNode* anchorNode = doc.allocNode("AnchorDay");
1967 if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::DayOfMonth) {
1968 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, anchorNode, "DayOfMonth", strDayOfMonth_);
1969 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::NthWeekday) {
1970 XMLNode* nthNode = doc.allocNode("NthWeekday");
1971 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, nthNode, "Nth", strNth_);
1972 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, nthNode, "Weekday", strWeekday_);
1973 XMLUtils::appendNode(anchorNode, nthNode);
1974 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::LastWeekday) {
1975 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, anchorNode, "LastWeekday", strWeekday_);
1976 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::BusinessDaysAfter) {
1977 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, anchorNode, "BusinessDaysAfter", strBusinessDaysAfter_);
1978 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek) {
1979 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, anchorNode, "WeeklyDayOfTheWeek", strWeekday_);
1980 } else {
1981 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, anchorNode, "CalendarDaysBefore", strCalendarDaysBefore_);
1982 }
1983 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, anchorNode);
1984 }
1985
1986 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "ContractFrequency", strContractFrequency_);
1987 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "Calendar", strCalendar_);
1988 if (!strExpiryCalendar_.empty())
1989 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "ExpiryCalendar", strExpiryCalendar_);
1990 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "ExpiryMonthLag", static_cast<int>(expiryMonthLag_));
1991
1992 if (!strOneContractMonth_.empty())
1993 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OneContractMonth", strOneContractMonth_);
1994
1995 if (!strOffsetDays_.empty())
1996 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OffsetDays", strOffsetDays_);
1997
1998 if (!strBdc_.empty())
1999 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "BusinessDayConvention", strBdc_);
2000
2001 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "AdjustBeforeOffset", adjustBeforeOffset_);
2002 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "IsAveraging", isAveraging_);
2003
2004 if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::BusinessDaysBefore) {
2005 if (optionExpiryOffset_>0)
2006 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionExpiryOffset", strOptionExpiryOffset_);
2007 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::DayOfMonth) {
2008 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionExpiryDay", static_cast<int>(optionExpiryDay_));
2009 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::NthWeekday) {
2010 XMLNode* nthNode = doc.allocNode("OptionNthWeekday");
2011 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, nthNode, "Nth", strOptionNth_);
2012 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, nthNode, "Weekday", strOptionWeekday_);
2013 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::LastWeekday) {
2014 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionExpiryLastWeekdayOfMonth", strOptionWeekday_);
2015 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek) {
2016 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionExpiryWeeklyDayOfTheWeek", strOptionWeekday_);
2017 }
2018
2019 if (!prohibitedExpiries_.empty()) {
2020 XMLNode* prohibitedExpiriesNode = doc.allocNode("ProhibitedExpiries");
2021 XMLNode* datesNode = XMLUtils::addChild(doc, prohibitedExpiriesNode, "Dates");
2022 for (ProhibitedExpiry pe : prohibitedExpiries_) {
2023 XMLUtils::appendNode(datesNode, pe.toXML(doc));
2024 }
2025 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, prohibitedExpiriesNode);
2026 }
2027
2028 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionExpiryMonthLag", static_cast<int>(optionExpiryMonthLag_));
2029
2030
2031 if (!strOptionBdc_.empty())
2032 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "OptionBusinessDayConvention", strOptionBdc_);
2033
2034 if (!futureContinuationMappings_.empty()) {
2035 map<string, string> tmp;
2036 for (const auto& kv : futureContinuationMappings_) {
2037 tmp[to_string(kv.first)] = to_string(kv.second);
2038 }
2039 XMLUtils::addChildren(doc, node, "FutureContinuationMappings",
2040 "ContinuationMapping", "From", "To", tmp);
2041 }
2042
2043 if (!optionContinuationMappings_.empty()) {
2044 map<string, string> tmp;
2045 for (const auto& kv : optionContinuationMappings_) {
2046 tmp[to_string(kv.first)] = to_string(kv.second);
2047 }
2048 XMLUtils::addChildren(doc, node, "OptionContinuationMappings",
2049 "ContinuationMapping", "From", "To", tmp);
2050 }
2051
2052 if (!averagingData_.empty()) {
2053 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, averagingData_.toXML(doc));
2054 }
2055
2056 if (hoursPerDay_ != Null<Natural>())
2057 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "HoursPerDay", static_cast<int>(hoursPerDay_));
2058
2059 if (offPeakPowerIndexData_) {
2060 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, offPeakPowerIndexData_->toXML(doc));
2061 }
2062
2063 if (!indexName_.empty())
2064 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "IndexName", indexName_);
2065
2066 if (!savingsTime_.empty())
2067 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "SavingsTime", savingsTime_);
2068
2069 if (contractFrequency_ == Monthly && !validContractMonths_.empty() && validContractMonths_.size() < 12) {
2070 XMLNode* validContractMonthNode = doc.allocNode("ValidContractMonths");
2071 for (auto month : validContractMonths_) {
2072 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, validContractMonthNode, "Month", to_string(month));
2073 }
2074 XMLUtils::appendNode(node, validContractMonthNode);
2075 }
2076
2077 if (balanceOfTheMonth_) {
2078 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "BalanceOfTheMonth", balanceOfTheMonth_);
2079 }
2080
2081 if (balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar_ != Calendar()) {
2082 XMLUtils::addChild(doc, node, "BalanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar", to_string(balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar_));
2083 }
2084
2085 return node;
2086}
2087
2088void CommodityFutureConvention::build() {
2089
2090 contractFrequency_ = parseAndValidateFrequency(strContractFrequency_);
2091 if (strOptionContractFrequency_.empty()) {
2092 optionContractFrequency_ = contractFrequency_;
2093 } else {
2094 optionContractFrequency_ = parseAndValidateFrequency(strOptionContractFrequency_);
2095 }
2096
2097 if (contractFrequency_ != Daily || optionContractFrequency_ != Daily) {
2098 if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::DayOfMonth) {
2099 dayOfMonth_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strDayOfMonth_);
2100 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::CalendarDaysBefore) {
2101 calendarDaysBefore_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strCalendarDaysBefore_);
2102 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::LastWeekday) {
2103 weekday_ = parseWeekday(strWeekday_);
2104 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::BusinessDaysAfter) {
2105 businessDaysAfter_ = lexical_cast<Integer>(strBusinessDaysAfter_);
2106 } else if (anchorType_ == AnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek) {
2107 weekday_ = parseWeekday(strWeekday_);
2108 } else {
2109 nth_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strNth_);
2110 weekday_ = parseWeekday(strWeekday_);
2111 }
2112 }
2113
2114 calendar_ = parseCalendar(strCalendar_);
2115 expiryCalendar_ = strExpiryCalendar_.empty() ? calendar_ : parseCalendar(strExpiryCalendar_);
2116
2117 // Optional entries
2118 oneContractMonth_ = strOneContractMonth_.empty() ? Month::Jan : parseMonth(strOneContractMonth_);
2119 offsetDays_ = strOffsetDays_.empty() ? 0 : lexical_cast<Integer>(strOffsetDays_);
2120 bdc_ = strBdc_.empty() ? Preceding : parseBusinessDayConvention(strBdc_);
2121
2122 if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::BusinessDaysBefore) {
2123 if (strOptionExpiryOffset_.empty())
2124 optionExpiryOffset_ = 0;
2125 else
2126 optionExpiryOffset_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strOptionExpiryOffset_);
2127 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::NthWeekday) {
2128 optionNth_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strOptionNth_);
2129 optionWeekday_ = parseWeekday(strOptionWeekday_);
2130 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::DayOfMonth) {
2131 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::DayOfMonth;
2132 optionExpiryDay_ = lexical_cast<Natural>(strOptionExpiryDay_);
2133 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::LastWeekday) {
2134 optionWeekday_ = parseWeekday(strOptionWeekday_);
2135 } else if (optionAnchorType_ == OptionAnchorType::WeeklyDayOfTheWeek) {
2136 optionWeekday_ = parseWeekday(strOptionWeekday_);
2137 } else {
2138 optionAnchorType_ = OptionAnchorType::BusinessDaysBefore;
2139 optionExpiryOffset_ = 0;
2140 }
2141
2142 optionBdc_ = strOptionBdc_.empty() ? Preceding : parseBusinessDayConvention(strOptionBdc_);
2143
2144 // Check the continuation mappings
2145 checkContinuationMappings(futureContinuationMappings_, "future");
2146 checkContinuationMappings(optionContinuationMappings_, "option");
2147
2148 // Check that neither of the indexes in OffPeakPowerIndexData self reference
2149 if (offPeakPowerIndexData_) {
2150 const string& opIdx = offPeakPowerIndexData_->offPeakIndex();
2151 QL_REQUIRE(id_ != opIdx, "The off-peak index (" << opIdx << ") cannot equal the index for which" <<
2152 " we are providing conventions (" << id_ << ").");
2153 const string& pIdx = offPeakPowerIndexData_->peakIndex();
2154 QL_REQUIRE(id_ != pIdx, "The peak index (" << pIdx << ") cannot equal the index for which" <<
2155 " we are providing conventions (" << id_ << ").");
2156 }
2157
2158 if (balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendarStr_.empty()) {
2159 balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar_ = Calendar();
2160 } else {
2161 balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendar_ = parseCalendar(balanceOfTheMonthPricingCalendarStr_);
2162 }
2163
2164 QL_REQUIRE(!balanceOfTheMonth_ || isAveraging(), "Balance of the month make only sense for averaging futures");
2165
2166}
2167
2168Frequency CommodityFutureConvention::parseAndValidateFrequency(const std::string & strFrequency) {
2169 auto freq = parseFrequency(strFrequency);
2170 QL_REQUIRE(freq == Annual || freq == Quarterly || freq == Monthly || freq == Weekly || freq == Daily,
2171 "Contract frequency should be annual, quarterly, monthly, weekly or daily but got " << freq);
2172 return freq;
2173}
2174
2175bool CommodityFutureConvention::validateBdc(const ProhibitedExpiry& pe) const {
2176 vector<BusinessDayConvention> bdcs{ pe.futureBdc(), pe.optionBdc() };
2177 for (auto bdc : bdcs) {
2178 if (!(bdc == Preceding || bdc == Following || bdc == ModifiedPreceding || bdc == ModifiedFollowing)) {
2179 WLOG("Prohibited expiry bdc must be one of {Preceding, Following, ModifiedPreceding," <<
2180 " ModifiedFollowing} but got " << bdc << " for date " << io::iso_date(pe.expiry()) << ".");
2181 return false;
2182 }
2183 }
2184 return true;
2185}

2197void FxOptionConvention::build() {
2198 atmType_ = parseAtmType(strAtmType_);
2199 deltaType_ = parseDeltaType(strDeltaType_);
2200 if (!strSwitchTenor_.empty()) {
2201 switchTenor_ = parsePeriod(strSwitchTenor_);
2202 longTermAtmType_ = parseAtmType(strLongTermAtmType_);
2203 longTermDeltaType_ = parseDeltaType(strLongTermDeltaType_);
2204 } else {
2205 switchTenor_ = 0 * Days;
2206 longTermAtmType_ = atmType_;
2207 longTermDeltaType_ = deltaType_;
2208 }
2209 if (!strRiskReversalInFavorOf_.empty()) {
2210 riskReversalInFavorOf_ = parseOptionType(strRiskReversalInFavorOf_);
2211 } else {
2212 riskReversalInFavorOf_ = Option::Call;
2213 }
2214 if (strButterflyStyle_.empty() || strButterflyStyle_ == "Broker") {
2215 butterflyIsBrokerStyle_ = true;
2216 } else if (strButterflyStyle_ == "Smile") {
2217 butterflyIsBrokerStyle_ = false;
2218 } else {
2219 QL_FAIL("invalid butterfly style '" << strButterflyStyle_ << "', expected Broker or Smile");
2220 }
2221}

2377
2378void Conventions::fromXML(XMLNode* node) {
2379
2380 XMLUtils::checkNode(node, "Conventions");
2381
2382 for (XMLNode* child = XMLUtils::getChildNode(node); child; child = XMLUtils::getNextSibling(child)) {
2383
2384 boost::shared_ptr<Convention> convention;
2385 string childName = XMLUtils::getNodeName(child);
2386
2387 // Some conventions depend on the already read conventions, since they parse an ibor or overnight
2388 // index which may be convention based. In this case we require the index convention to appear
2389 // before the convention that depends on it in the input.
2390
2391 if (childName == "Zero") {
2392 convention.reset(new ZeroRateConvention());
2393 } else if (childName == "Deposit") {
2394 convention.reset(new DepositConvention());
2395 } else if (childName == "Future") {
2396 convention.reset(new FutureConvention());
2397 } else if (childName == "FRA") {
2398 convention.reset(new FraConvention());
2399 } else if (childName == "OIS") {
2400 convention.reset(new OisConvention());
2401 } else if (childName == "Swap") {
2402 convention.reset(new IRSwapConvention());
2403 } else if (childName == "AverageOIS") {
2404 convention.reset(new AverageOisConvention());
2405 } else if (childName == "TenorBasisSwap") {
2406 convention.reset(new TenorBasisSwapConvention());
2407 } else if (childName == "TenorBasisTwoSwap") {
2408 convention.reset(new TenorBasisTwoSwapConvention());
2409 } else if (childName == "BMABasisSwap") {
2410 convention.reset(new BMABasisSwapConvention());
2411 } else if (childName == "FX") {
2412 convention.reset(new FXConvention());
2413 } else if (childName == "CrossCurrencyBasis") {
2414 convention.reset(new CrossCcyBasisSwapConvention());
2415 } else if (childName == "CrossCurrencyFixFloat") {
2416 convention.reset(new CrossCcyFixFloatSwapConvention());
2417 } else if (childName == "CDS") {
2418 convention.reset(new CdsConvention());
2419 } else if (childName == "SwapIndex") {
2420 convention.reset(new SwapIndexConvention());
2421 } else if (childName == "InflationSwap") {
2422 convention.reset(new InflationSwapConvention());
2423 } else if (childName == "CmsSpreadOption") {
2424 convention.reset(new CmsSpreadOptionConvention());
2425 } else if (childName == "CommodityForward") {
2426 convention = boost::make_shared<CommodityForwardConvention>();
2427 } else if (childName == "CommodityFuture") {
2428 convention = boost::make_shared<CommodityFutureConvention>();
2429 } else if (childName == "FxOption") {
2430 convention = boost::make_shared<FxOptionConvention>();
2431 } else if (childName == "IborIndex") {
2432 convention = boost::make_shared<IborIndexConvention>();
2433 } else if (childName == "OvernightIndex") {
2434 convention = boost::make_shared<OvernightIndexConvention>();
2435 } else if (childName == "ZeroInflationIndex") {
2436 convention = boost::make_shared<ZeroInflationIndexConvention>();
2437 } else if (childName == "BondYield") {
2438 convention = boost::make_shared<BondYieldConvention>();
2439 } else {
2440 // No need to QL_FAIL here, just go to the next one
2441 WLOG("Convention name, " << childName << ", not recognized.");
2442 continue;
2443 }
2444
2445 string id = XMLUtils::getChildValue(child, "Id", true);
2446
2447 try {
2448 DLOG("Loading Convention " << id);
2449 convention->fromXML(child);
2450 add(convention);
2451 } catch (exception& e) {
2452 WLOG("Exception parsing convention "
2453 "XML Node (id = "
2454 << id << ") : " << e.what());
2455 }
2456 }
2457}
2458
2459XMLNode* Conventions::toXML(XMLDocument& doc) {
2460
2461 XMLNode* conventionsNode = doc.allocNode("Conventions");
2462
2463 map<string, boost::shared_ptr<Convention>>::const_iterator it;
2464 for (it = data_.begin(); it != data_.end(); ++it) {
2465 XMLUtils::appendNode(conventionsNode, data_[it->first]->toXML(doc));
2466 }
2467 return conventionsNode;
2468}

2470void Conventions::clear() {
2471 boost::unique_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2472 data_.clear();
2473}
2474
2475std::string flip(const std::string& id, const std::string& sep) {
2476 boost::tokenizer<boost::escaped_list_separator<char>> tokenSplit(id, boost::escaped_list_separator<char>("\\", sep, "\""));
2477 std::vector<std::string> tokens(tokenSplit.begin(), tokenSplit.end());
2478 if (tokens.size() >= 2 && tokens[0].size() == 3 && tokens[1].size() == 3) {
2479 std::string id2 = tokens[1] + sep + tokens[0];
2480 for (Size i = 2; i < tokens.size(); ++i)
2481 id2 += sep + tokens[i];
2482 return id2; // flipped id
2483 }
2484 else return id; // original id
2485}
2486
2487boost::shared_ptr<Convention> Conventions::get(const string& id) const {
2488 boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2489 auto it = data_.find(id);
2490 if (it != data_.end())
2491 return it->second;
2492 else {
2493 std::string id2 = flip(id);
2494 auto it = data_.find(id2);
2495 if (it != data_.end() && boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<CrossCcyBasisSwapConvention>(it->second)) {
2496 return it->second;
2497 }
2498 else {
2499 QL_FAIL("Cannot find conventions for id " << id);
2500 }
2501 }
2502}
2503
2504boost::shared_ptr<Convention> Conventions::getFxConvention(const string& ccy1, const string& ccy2) const {
2505 boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2506 for (auto c : data_) {
2507 auto fxCon = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<FXConvention>(c.second);
2508 if (fxCon) {
2509 string source = fxCon->sourceCurrency().code();
2510 string target = fxCon->targetCurrency().code();
2511 if ((source == ccy1 && target == ccy2) || (target == ccy1 && source == ccy2))
2512 return fxCon;
2513 }
2514 }
2515 QL_FAIL("Cannot find FX conventions for ccys " << ccy1 << " and " << ccy2);
2516}
2517
2518pair<bool, boost::shared_ptr<Convention>> Conventions::get(const string& id, const Convention::Type& type) const {
2519 boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2520 auto c = data_.find(id);
2521 if (c == data_.end() || c->second->type() != type)
2522 return make_pair(false, nullptr);
2523 else
2524 return make_pair(true, c->second);
2525}
2526
2527std::set<boost::shared_ptr<Convention>> Conventions::get(const Convention::Type& type) const {
2528 boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2529 std::set<boost::shared_ptr<Convention>> result;
2530 for (auto const& d : data_) {
2531 if (d.second->type() == type)
2532 result.insert(d.second);
2533 }
2534 return result;
2535}
2536
2537bool Conventions::has(const string& id) const {
2538 boost::shared_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2539 if (data_.find(id) != data_.end())
2540 return true;
2541 else {
2542 std::string id2 = flip(id);
2543 if (data_.find(id2) != data_.end())
2544 return true;
2545 else
2546 return false;
2547 }
2548}
2549
2550bool Conventions::has(const std::string& id, const Convention::Type& type) const {
2551 return get(id, type).first;
2552}
2553
2554void Conventions::add(const boost::shared_ptr<Convention>& convention) {
2555 boost::unique_lock<boost::shared_mutex> lock(mutex_);
2556 const string& id = convention->id();
2557 QL_REQUIRE(data_.find(id) == data_.end(), "Convention already exists for id " << id);
2558 data_[id] = convention;
2559}
